review: Apple simply works. And I have to admit, this one works well.Setting it up is really simple and it streams high definition contents to my hd tv flawlessly.When chromecast first came on the market, I was one of the first people to buy it.  But after a while, I got tired of chromecast's inability to maintain steady streaming.  While watching, the streaming quality would degrade over time, and then eventually lose its connection.  Apple TV 's mirroring feature or its AirTV, however, never suffered this in any way.  It "casted" whatever I was watching on my iPad mini to my tv via AppleTV's  airTV  feature and maintained great stream quality.The only drawback is that it lack app variety.  Since I have a roku on the same tv, this is not a problem for me.  I use AppleTV for streaming videos from websites for which there is no app counterpart.  For that purpose, it is PERFECT!
